title: Nizza Comfort Shoes
subtitle: Children Originals
description:
Classic adidas Nizza style for everyday life. These kids' shoes are comfortable thanks to the lightweight, cushiony midsole. The hook-and-loop straps make it a breeze to slip them on (and off).

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Hook-and-loop strap closure; Synthetic upper; Synthetic lining; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Cloud White; Product code: GX4097

title: Adizero Afterburner NWV Cleats
subtitle: Men's Baseball
description:
When there's 90 feet between you and glory, there's no room for an inch of hesitation. Whether you plan to steal second or take the wide turn for extra bases, these adidas baseball cleats have that superlight feel to let you run free. A LIGHTLOCK upper secures your feet while the Lightstrike midsole cushions upon impact without adding weight. Now you can make that highlight-reel catch or turn on the jets to give your team the edge.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; LIGHTLOCK upper; Sock-like fit; Lightstrike midsole; Cleated synthetic outsole; Textile lining; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Impact Orange / Beam Orange / Pulse Lilac; Product code: GZ4578
colors: Impact Orange / Beam Orange / Pulse Lilac

Comfort makes all the difference. Since these juniors' Swift Run 22 Shoes are inspired by classic adidas running styles, they're all about keeping up with a fast pace. A soft EVA midsole comes in with lightweight cushioning, so no matter how you're moving, you feel supported and confident.

Light on weight, long on comfort. These adidas baseball cleats are tailored for speed. The Sprintskin upper delivers elevated support, while the Lightstrike midsole offers superlight cushioning, relieving cleat pressure to keep you flying.

title: Y-3 Qisan Cozy Shoes
subtitle: Y-3
description:
"Y-3 is a strong examination of the blend of sport and style and the tension caused by mixing tradition with all that is modern."  — Yohji Yamamoto 

Y-3 blends inspiration from its past with state-of-the-art adidas technology to introduce a new silhouette. The Qisan Cozy Shoes take cues from the iconic Y-3 Qasa, borrowing inspiration from the heel tab to complete the slip-on design. A neoprene upper with leather and rubber detailing establishes the connection further. The TPU plate shines through the distinctive tooling.
details: Slip-on; Neoprene upper with leather and rubber detailing; Suede lining; Lightstrike cushioning; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Black / Blush Green / Red; Product code: GX1080

title: ZNCHILL LIGHTMOTION+ Lifestyle Adult Shoe
subtitle: Women's Sportswear
description:
Is it the shape? Is it the color play? One way or another, these chunky adidas sneakers will win you over. The textile upper is comfy and casual. The LIGHTMOTION midsole is soft and springy, while the rubber outsole gives plenty of grip to keep you grounded on slushy streets. Pair yours with cuffed joggers or a maxi dress, and they'll score you some likes on your socials too. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

colors: Almost Blue / Beam Yellow / Grey One

title: Tiana Stan Smith Shoes

description:
For over 50 years, the adidas Stan Smith sneaker has solidified its place as a style icon. Now this kids' version gets a magical update with these shoes inspired by Tiana, the princess from Disney's "The Princess and the Frog." Make a statement with cool green details set on a synthetic leather upper and a printed sockliner that adds a fun detail to classic comfort. The heel patches are a reminder that "It's not easy being green," so it's important to do our best for the planet. A snug fit with an OrthoLite® sockliner ensures that comfort isn't sacrificed for style.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
